Horrific, winged women with vulture-like lower bodies. They keen a hypnotic song.

Song. Enemies who can hear within double near DC 12 CHA or dazed and drawn to harpy for 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.

Bloodthirsty apex predators of the sea. Gray, torpedo-like body.

AC 11, HP 15, ATK 1 bite +3 (1d10), MV near (swim), S +3, D +1, C +2, I -3, W +1, Ch -3, AL N, LV 3

A mud-brown insect as big as a wolf with two feathery antennae. Consumes metal.

AC 13, HP 19, ATK 2 claw +3 (1d6), MV near (climb), S +2, D +3, C +1, I -3, W +1, Ch -3, AL N, LV 4

Corrosive. Metal that touches the rust monster is destroyed on a d6 roll of 1-3.
A tired and emaciated musician in worn clothes.

Carnivorous flowers as large as a human. They reek of carrion.

AC 9, HP 10, ATK 1 bite +1 (1d4 + toxin), MV none, S +1, D -3, C +1, I -4, W -3, Ch -4, AL N, LV 2

Toxin. DC 12 CON or unconscious for 1d4 rounds.

system.description: [[/r 1d4]]: Summon: 1. Nothing, 2. [[/r 1d4]]+1 @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds}, 3. @UUID[Actor.TOQT7tcNE0JN4lcG]{Nestor}, 4. @UUID[Actor.dUp16fdIVoJdaHFl]{Eunice}.
[[/r 1d6]]: 1. Shink 2. Teleport 3. Transform 4. Grow 5. Mind Control 6. Disintegrate (3:6 chance raygun breaks). Effects last [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

system.notes:
The Dastardly Villain. Wears black eye mask with red lions mane, black and red rubber suit with a flowing cape.

AC 12, HP 9, ATK 1 ruckus raygun (near) +4 (1d4 + ruckus) or 1 reserve remote, MV near, S +0, D +1, C +0, I +4, W +2, Ch +2, AL C, LV 2

Ruckus. 1d6: 1. Shink 2. Teleport 3. Transform 4. Grow 5. Mind Control 6. Disintegrate (3:6 chance raygun breaks). Effects last 1d4 rounds.

Reserve Remote. 1d4: Summon 1. Nothing 2. 1d4+1 Red Maned Kobolds 3. Nestor 4. Eunice.

system.description: [[/r 1d4]] damage at start of turn, DC 12 STR to escape. Cannot move while squeezing.

The Legless Giant. Hill Giant with long, stringy hair. Arms like tree trunks.

AC 11, HP 17, ATK 2 fists +3 (2d4 + squeeze) or 1 boulder (far) +3 (1d10), MV double near, S +3, D -1, C +3, I -2, W -2, Ch -2, AL C, LV 4

Squeeze. 1d4 damage at start of turn, DC 12 STR to escape. Cannot move while squeezing.

system.description: Can move an object up to 500 lbs double near. DC 15 STR to resist.
DC 13 INT or paralyzed [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

system.notes:
The Psychic Jellyfish. Contained in a fishbowl affixed to mechanical spider legs.

AC 13, HP 14, ATK 1 psychic sting (near) +4 (1d6 + mind toxin) or 1 telekintic toss (far) +4 (2d4) or 1 telekinesis, MV near, S -3, D +1, C +0, I +3, W +1, Ch +1, AL C, LV 4

Mind Toxin. DC 13 INT or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

Telekinesis. Can move an object up to 500 lbs double near. DC 15 STR to resist.

system.description: DC 15 CON or infected. DC 15 CON each day or lose [[/r 1d6]] HP (can't heal). Ends on success.

system.notes:
Stumpy, three-legged beasts with barbed tentacles and vast mouths. Drawn by rot and filth.

AC 13, HP 35, ATK 2 tentacle +5 (1d8) and 1 bite +5 (1d10 + disease), MV near, S +4, D -1, C +4, I -2, W +0, Ch -3, AL N, LV 7

Disease. DC 15 CON or infected. DC 15 CON each day or lose 1d6 HP (can't heal). Ends on success.

A scaly dog-lizard painted with colorful stripes and rattling a hefty leg bone strung with beads and feathers.

AC 13 (leather), HP 13, ATK 1 club +1 (1d4) or 1 spell +2, MV near, S -2, D +2, C +0, I -1, W +1, Ch +2, AL C, LV 3

Scorpion Sting (CHA Spell). DC 11. Near range, one target. 1d6 damage and target has DISADV on next attack roll or check.

Fire immune.

Black Mechanical Lion with red eyes and jaws dripping with flames.

Impervious. Fire immune.

Fire Breath. Fills a near-sized cube extending from Mechanical Lion. DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage. Cannot use again for 1d4 rounds.

Flitting, sentient shadows in the vague shape of a human.

caption: A Pulp Adventure for Character Levels 1-3

folders.name: The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon
The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon
The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon
The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon
The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon
The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon

system.description:
This shield is carved as a roaring lion's face with a flowing mane.

Bonus. +1 shield.

Benefit. Once per day, you can command the lion to animate and bellow a ferocious roar. All hostile creatures within near range must immediately make a morale check.
When worn, people magically forget your true identity.

Wand with random effect. [[/r 1d6]]:

  1. Shink

  2. Teleport

  3. Transform

  4. Grow

  5. Mind Control

  6. Disintegrate (3:6 chance raygun breaks).

Effects last [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

text.content:
BACKGROUND

Years ago, an eccentric nobleman grew bored of his frivolous, hedonistic lifestyle. To satiate his nefarious thoughts, he used his immense wealth to purchase the Diabolical Lair from a gold dragon. The nobleman retrofitted the lair to conduct dastardly experiments, which led him to discover a new purpose: to create as much chaos as possible. Combining his love of science while honoring the first manifestation of chaos, he took on a new moniker, Professor Memnon.

FACTIONS

@UUID[Actor.hz7tggbkC9xtHX3n]{Professor Memnon}. Callous Megalomaniac. Loves to test his chaotic creations on the unsuspecting. Believes his diabolical lair is impervious.

@UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds}. Subservient and Crafty. Included in the sale of the lair. Forced to wear red manes. They maintain and improve the diabolical traps. May hold disdain for their new boss.

@UUID[Actor.TOQT7tcNE0JN4lcG]{Nestor} the Legless Giant. Loyal and Dimwitted. Professor Memnon’s bodyguard. Adept at climbing and swinging, can traverse lair with ease.

@UUID[Actor.dUp16fdIVoJdaHFl]{Eunice} the Psychic Jellyfish. Deceitful and Cruel. Eunice devoured her children to absorb their power. Professor Memnon built her a robotic frame so she can freely roam the lair.

THE DIABOLICAL LAIR

The Diabolical Lair is a secure location carved into a mountain close to a nearby town. Unless otherwise stated, the walls and doors are made from carved stone & the ceilings are 15ft high.

Entrances and Exits. Carved steps pass through the mouth of an enormous stone lion and lead to @UUID[.kQOeIzaGH1bPwAaJ]{ Area 1} the entrance hall. It is possible, yet treacherous, to climb up the waterfall to @UUID[.PDM11MCYqk84cytY]{Area 6} (4:6 chance the @UUID[Actor.KOvytBf5KJdazLtA]{Harpy} is in her nest).

Danger Level. Risky. 1:6 chance for a random encounter every 2 crawling rounds or when the PCs make noise or activate a weird device

MAKE IT YOURS

This adventure can be run as a one shot, or inserted into an existing campaign. Professor Memnon’s identity is depicted as a nameless noble, but he should be linked to the PCs: an odd patron, friendly mayor, or estranged relative. It is recommended to play this module using Pulp Mode (SD p.111).

RUMORS

d6

Rumor

Truth

1

Birds have been acting strangely, falling from the sky, their wings singed and eyes dissolved.

Half-True

2

The Diabolical Lair was purchased from a Gold Dragon, and she was forced to relocate her hoard.

True

3

He often collaborates with other villains: Ramlaat’s Raider and Seductress Shune. They are forming a villainous super league.

False

4

A local musician bragged about carousing with a Legless Giant and a Rust Monster. He has not been seen for months.

True

5

The Professor utilizes artifice, harnessing the elements to power his dastardly experiments.

True

6

Ritual sacrifice is being performed in the Diabolic Lair in an attempt to summon a deity.

False

Ceilings: 80ft high, echoing. Statue surrounded by Moat: Marble, Under construction. 3:6 chance 1 @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobold} is carving statue. Staircase: Stone, steep, uneven. North Balcony: Overlooking statue. 60ft high. East/West Balcony: 30ft high.

  • Statue: Bottom half looks like a dragon, top half man with a mask and lions mane. 66 Tiny rubies embedded in mane (1 gp each). Dull chisel at base of statue.

  • Moat: Fetid water, 5 ft deep, dead koi float on surface. [[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Actor.zN5X9AAsSYO2L05D]{Giant Leeches} lurk at bottom.

  • Staircase: Carved Stone. Depress slightly when stepped on.

  • Balcony: Lever turns staircase into slide. DC 12 STR or DEX to climb.

Wall: Made from @UUID[Actor.2WeYuB5RPALi8l0G]{Gelatinous Cube}, 40ft high, sturdy stone platform set atop. Dead Red Maned Kobold: Fell from top of wall. Kobold Camp: [[/r 1d8]]+1 @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds}. Stranded on top of wall, hungry. Teleport Circle: Scuffed, inoperable.

  • Gelatinous Cube Wall: Stationary, slowly engulfs objects placed inside. Dissolved corpse suspended within 20ft up. Grappling hook, 12 iron spikes, spear, 2 daggers, 28 gp, 84 sp, 14 cp scattered throughout.

    • Dissolved Corpse: Dwarf wearing magical wide brimmed Kettle Hat that can be used to instantly boil liquid (110 gp).

  • Dead Red Maned Kobold: Twisted limbs. Bag of 30 live crickets.

  • Kobold Camp: Arguing over who they should eat.

  • Teleport Circle: Chalk & blood. DC 15 INT to fix. Leads to Area 11.

Supplies: Mundane goods include: Mops, brooms, nails, bucket, rope, mallet, apron. Each PC can attempt to Rummage once through the supplies.

  • Rummage. [[/r 1d6]]

    1. 3:6 Random Encounter

    2. Book of lewd drawings

    3. Step ladder

    4. Jug of bleach

    5. Rubber gloves

    6. Silver belt buckle with etched stingbat logo (15 gp)

Ceiling: Low, 5 ft high, porous. Sloped floor: Slippery, 45 degrees.

  • Ceiling: [[/r 2d4]] @UUID[Actor.9XOVMxDtEB7MxVxM]{Stingbats} roost in holes. React to light.

  • Sloped Floor: Covered in a layer of guano. DC 13 STR to climb.

Plaid Couch and Chair: Covered in a sheet of transparent tarp. Coffee Table: Empty tankards, defaced tome. Liquor Cabinet: Various spirits, half empty. Locked Glass Case: Diorama depicts tiny diabolical lair.

  • Plaid Couch and Chair: Dust cloud fills room if tarp removed. DC 10 CON or nonstop coughing for [[/r 1d4]] hours.

  • Coffee Table Tome: Previous years copy of Villain of the Year. Includes profiles for Ramlaat’s Raider, Seductress Shune & The Lord of Ord. Images of the villains are defaced with ugly mustaches, beards and goofy eyes.

  • Liquor Cabinet: Whisky, wine, rum, mead, absinthe half empty. Locked drawer behind bottles, key under floor mat in @UUID[.4Dk6DWbMv4cup0FB]{Area 10}.

    • Locked Drawer: DC 15 DEX. Bottle of magical champagne that makes you float an inch above ground for 1 hour. [[/r 1d4]] uses. Gold quill that makes your writing more vulgar (25 gp).

  • Locked Glass Case: Generator can be seen in waterfall @UUID[.PDM11MCYqk84cytY]{Area 6}. Professor Memnon, Nestor, and Eunice action figures (10gp each) stand in @UUID[.nHRBG9zYotGRBA1r]{Area 7}. Hidden button behind case opens it. DC 12 STR to break. 4:6 chance @UUID[Actor.dUp16fdIVoJdaHFl]{Eunice} investigates if broken.

Pipes: Pumps water into the lake that flows off edge of mountain. Lake: Cold, misty, strong current. Waterfall: Rocky, 200 ft drop. Ladder: Metal, Leads to Area 7.

  • Pipes: No water flows from center pipe. 3ft diameter, can squeeze through to @UUID[.j6JA0ylsAJiA6y7f]{Area 8b}.

  • Lake: DC 12 STR or swept away.

  • Waterfall: DC 15 STR climb up or rappel down with climbing gear. Generator can be seen from edge.

  • Generator: Operational. Provides power to Avian Control Ray in @UUID[.nHRBG9zYotGRBA1r]{Area 7}, Sparking Wires in @UUID[.LdiOF6xw2Ubn7pOR]{Area 9}.

Cavern: Stalactites covered in Mushrooms, dripping oozy water. Cliff: Gusty, sheer, 230 ft drop. Avian Control Ray: Buzzing with power (if Generator in @UUID[.PDM11MCYqk84cytY]{Area 6} is functional). Hear: Breathy, soothing song.

  • Mushrooms: Bitter, jellied. If consumed [[/r 1d4]]: 1. Tree grows from head. 2. Vomit butterflies after speaking more than 5 seconds. 3. Ears, teeth and fingers grow 2x size. 4. Skin becomes translucent. Effects last [[/r 1d4]] hours.

  • Avian Control Ray: Crank fires beam into sky. Befriend a bird [[/r 1d6]]: 1. Pigeon. 2. @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monsters.Actor.bzKSq624safyHLbE]{Vulture}. 3. @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monsters.Actor.xUxKG0CR6Elw1l7h]{Cockatrice}. 4. @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monsters.Actor.SgSkMF7D9BE69ubm]{Hippogriff}. 5. @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monsters.Actor.72LUt9AEysl22JGv]{Griffon}. 6. @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monsters.Actor.39kt1XjVZ4JZSdEj]{Roc}. Friendship lasts [[/r 1d4]] days. Can only befriend one bird at a time. If used, alerts @UUID[Actor.TOQT7tcNE0JN4lcG]{Nestor} who arrives in [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

    • Dismantle: Powered by hummingbird skeleton encased in crystal that allows you to talk to birds (150 gp).

  • Harpy: In nest. Can only be seen from cliff edge. @UUID[Actor.KOvytBf5KJdazLtA]{Harpy} uses song, DC 12 CHA to lure players off cliff.

    • Harpy Nest: 15 ft down. 3 Harpy Eggs (25 gp each).

Levers: Dozens, various sizes, affixed to wall. Elevator: Caged, rope pulley, ascends to darkness.

  • Pull Lever. DC 15 INT grants advantage on roll. [[/r 1d4]]:

    1. Alarm alerts Eunice who arrives in [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

    2. Shocked for [[/r 1d6]] damage.

    3. Elevator ascends, random encounter in @UUID[.j6JA0ylsAJiA6y7f]{Area 8b}.

    4. Elevator ascends.

Sparking Wires: Unstable, crackling, humming. Pool: Electrified, black, rippling. Chest: Massive, stone, gilded. Runes: Etched in wall behind chest. Smell: Ozone. Electricity: Powered by Generator in @UUID[.PDM11MCYqk84cytY]{Area 6}.

  • Sparking Wires: Shocking, [[/r 1d6]] damage if touched.

  • Pool: Electrified, [[/r 1d6]] damage if touched. Home to [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Actor.M5cy3sseAbKhIonm]{Voltaic Sharks}.

  • Underwater Tunnel: Leads to @UUID[.3X4wVwtxOc0oWgx6]{Area 15}.

  • Runes: Written in Draconic. Roughly translates to “Come with nothing to leave with everything.“ @UUID[Macro.6LV7jG4mIaI0DAbL]{Display Runes (Area 9)}

  • Chest: Gold dragon engravings. unlocked, slightly magnetized. Magnetism reverses when opened, pushes any metal object 15 ft away. DC 18 STR to avoid being pushed if wearing metal armor.

    • Contents: 350 gp etched with roaring lion insignia. Rubber suit that reduces electricity damage by [[/r 1d4]] (115 gp). A polite wand of hold person, that makes the target invunerable while under its effect, and says nice things about them (220 gp). A broken pair of gigantic, metal, prosthetic legs (30gp).

Doormat: Woven, says “wipe your feet”. Treadmill: Moves in both directions. 20 ft per round.

  • Doormat: Key labelled liquor cabinet for @UUID[.RJt2U2r2irvgjhy3]{Area 5} underneath.

  • Treadmill: Anything but bare feet sticks to it. DC 18 STR to remove.

  • Hidden Blades: Emerge from ground and ceiling and walls. [[/r 2d6]] damage DC 13 DEX to avoid. Automatic fail if stuck.
Teleport Circle: Chalk and blood. Connects to Teleport Circle in @UUID[.4y9KDiBv6R8PYw9O]{Area 2} if it has been repaired

Bar: [[/r 1d6]]+2 @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds} sit drinking. Bartender: Named @UUID[Actor.ou6o69v9Q9KebtLu]{Wallace} wears red vest serves drinks in corroded tankards in exchange for scrap metal. Walls: Plastered with lion memorabilia. Stage: Caged musician hums laboriously.

  • Bar: Can attempt to carouse by offering Wallace scrap metal. Add bonus to roll based on amount offered. 25lbs: 0, 75lbs: +1, 150lbs: +2.

    • Carousing: [[/r 1d4]] + bonus: 1. Wake up in locked cage on stage (1xp). 2. Slept under bar, weapons rusted (2xp). 3. Win tiny trinket (15gp) in a pub game (2xp). 4. Invent a cocktail that heals 1d6 hp (3xp). 5. Talk philosophy with kobolds, +1 INT (3xp). 6. Befriend Wallace, acquire cage key (4xp).

  • Walls: Affixed signage includes Lion Shaped Mirror (35 gp), Bronze Bell (20 gp) & @UUID[Item.kwWrp4qsLvaykO3W]{Shield of the Lion} that hangs behind bar.

  • Stage: @UUID[Actor.PkxB0vHEAbvFje6m]{Hayworth} the bard sits in cage, tired, emaciated.

    • Cage: Rusty, locked DC 15 DEX or DC 18 STR to break.

Plants: [[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Actor.5GyaYdgroNz7YU66]{Rot Flowers} react to light. Smell: Carrion. Doors: Faint outlines on wall. Labelled, @UUID[.UAOWmXWjEpY0Qvcb]{Balcony}, @UUID[.3X4wVwtxOc0oWgx6]{Wave Pool} & @UUID[.SNKUfHtCjpd1NHPD]{Bedroom}.

  • Rot Flowers: Calm in dark.

  • Doors: Appear in total darkness.

1:6 Chance @UUID[Actor.hz7tggbkC9xtHX3n]{Professor Memnon} stands ruminating. Balcony: Overlooks nearby town, 250ft high.

Clay Pots: Dozens, filled with [[/r 1d4]]: 1. Jellied Eels 2. Stingbat Guano 3. Fermented Cabbage 4. 3000 sp

2:6 Chance @UUID[Actor.hz7tggbkC9xtHX3n]{Professor Memnon} is swimming. Wave Pool: Powered by a chained @UUID[Actor.6R8Dmj8tm1BuyyTt]{Otyugh} flailing tentacles. Chest: Unlocked, leaking black ichor. Wardrobe: Oak, engraved with filigree. Smell: Pungent, rot.

  • Wave Pool: Underwater tunnel leads to @UUID[.LdiOF6xw2Ubn7pOR]{Area 9}.

  • Chest: Diseased meat, rotten stingbats, half a shark, griffon parts. Golden jawbone (25 gp) hidden at bottom.

  • Wardrobe: 10 red silk robes embroidered with “PM” (5 gp each).

4:6 Chance @UUID[Actor.hz7tggbkC9xtHX3n]{Professor Memnon} sitting at desk. Bed: Lion shaped, fur blankets. Floor: Lion head mosaic, red stone. Bookshelves: Tomes, figurines, plants. Desk: Chiseled obsidian, stacks of parchment, wooden case. Portrait: Budoir painting hangs on wall.

  • Bed: Silk sheets, rare fur blanket (65 gp).

  • Bookshelves: Scientific blueprints, self help books, large section dedicated to historical romance. Ivory ferret statue (45 gp).

  • Desk: Parchment contains multiple drafts of villanous memoirs. Rosewood case contains set of fine inks (20 gp).

  • Budoir Portrait: Expertly painted, gilded frame (45 gp). Moving reveals locked safe DC 20 DEX, Professor Memnon has key.

    • Locked Safe: Deed to the Diabolical Lair, 175 gp etched with roaring lion insignia. Jeweled lion medallion (80 gp).
Hole in floor: 80 ft drop. Pipe: Grate, DC 15 STR to remove. Leads to @UUID[.PDM11MCYqk84cytY]{Area 6}. Lever: Lowers elevator.

If the players are able to defeat Professor Memnon they can obtain the following:

  • Key to locked safe in @UUID[.SNKUfHtCjpd1NHPD]{Area 16}

  • @UUID[Item.xW3V656hDFKmslru]{Memnon’s Mask}. When worn, people magically forget your true identity.

  • @UUID[Item.xoyNGtaRpTqNYr5i]{Ruckus Raygun}. Wand with random effect. 1d6: 1. Shink 2. Teleport 3. Transform 4. Grow 5. Mind Control 6. Disintegrate (3:6 chance raygun breaks). Effects last 1d4 rounds.

INSPIRATION

This pulp funhouse dungeon draws inspiration from Doctor Satan, written by Paul Ernst. In these novelette’s, Doctor Satan is a rich man who obsesses over the occult and strange experiments. He uses his resources to become the “world's weirdest criminal”. He is assisted by a legless giant named Bostiff, a direct inspiration for Nestor. I have also included numerous easter eggs that reference Doctor Satan’s vile experiments, as well as some subtle nods to the other assigned covers, Thing of Darkness & John Cawder’s Wife.

- ERSK

This Product Was Created For: The Shadowdark Weird Tales Game Jam

Writing and Graphic Design by: Richard Jackson

This Product Contains AI Generated Art Assets Created With Midjourney

The Diabolical Lair of Professor Memnon is an independent product published under the Shadowdark RPG Third-Party License and is not affiliated with The Arcane Library, LLC. Shadowdark RPG © 2023 The Arcane Library, LLC.

@UUID[RollTable.l0iP6m1e2OyAflQz]{Random Encounters}

Random Encounters

2d6

Details

2

@UUID[Actor.dUp16fdIVoJdaHFl]{Eunice} assembles a new trap [[/r 1d4]]: 1. Explosive Glyph, 2. Electrified Cage, 3. Giant Magnet, 4. Mind Control Beam

3

Panicked @UUID[Actor.TOQT7tcNE0JN4lcG]{Nestor} frantically looks for his pet mouse Charleston

4

@UUID[Actor.wIY364uJnTclsGib]{Shadow of Professor Memnon} stalks the players

5

[[/r 1d6+1]] @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds} shoo away [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Actor.9XOVMxDtEB7MxVxM]{Stingbats}

6

@UUID[Actor.TOQT7tcNE0JN4lcG]{Nestor} pulls cart filled with random machine parts for repairs

7

Hologram of Professor Memnon barks orders at a group of [[/r 2d4]] @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds}

8

@UUID[Actor.hgYW7BjsihI6mmAn]{Kobold Sorcerer} directs [[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Actor.4KXEJGg63d4FctWW]{Red Maned Kobolds} carrying a large wire that sparks with electricity

9

2 ft wide portal opens to Area (Current Area + [[/r 1d4]])

10
